back_flavor: While he was working with the Boston Police Department, Tommy thought there was no such thing as real monsters. When he got loaned out to the sleepy river town of Arkham, he learned he couldn't have been more wrong. That was almost a year ago at this point, and despite still being "the new guy," he's pretty sure he's seen far more out on the beat than anyone else on the force. Now he's working hard to prove he's not a laughingstock to the rest of the police department, all while facing off against half the monsters of Arkham. And he's learned that not all monsters have fangs and tentacles.
back_text: Deck Size: 30. Deckbuilding Options: Guardian cards ([guardian]) level 0-5, Neutral cards level 0-5. Deckbuilding Requirements (do not count toward deck size): Becky, Loose Cannon, 1 random basic weakness.
flavor: "This uniform means something. I'm reminded of that every time I put it on."
name: Tommy Muldoon
text:
[action] Spend 1 resource, or discard a [[Firearm]] asset you control from play: Play a [[Firearm]] asset from your hand, paying its cost. It enters play with 2 additional ammo on it.
[elder_sign] effect: +1. Place 1 ammo on an asset you control with uses (ammo).

name: Becky
text: Tommy Muldoon deck only. Uses (2 ammo). [action] Spend 1 ammo: Fight ([combat]). You get +2 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack. [reaction] When you trigger the above [action] ability, exhaust Becky: This attack ignores the aloof and retaliate keywords.

name: Loose Cannon
text: Revelation - You must either discard each [[Firearm]] asset you control or lose 5 resources.

flavor: It's mostly for show, but handy when you need it.
name: Service Revolver
text: Uses (3 ammo). [reaction] After an enemy attacks you, spend 1 ammo: Fight ([combat]). This attack targets that enemy. You get +1 [combat] and deal +1 damage for this attack.

name: Protective Vest
text: [reaction] After you play Protective Vest: Search the top 6 cards of your deck for a [[Firearm]] or [[Upgrade]] card and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

name: Iron Sights
text:
Fast. Play only during your turn.
Attach to a [[Firearm]] asset you control.
[action] Exhaust Iron Sights: You get +3 skill value the next time you fight using attached asset this turn. This action does not provoke attacks of opportunity.
